about_the_game:
This is the soundtrack to DESOLATE, including 19 tracks, all encoded as 320kbps MP3.

The soundtrack is composed specifically for the game by Russian artist Alexandr Zorn. It is going to be updated in the future.

Track List:

1. OST DESOLATE Menu 0:56
2. Granichny Island 3:01
3. Old world 6:20
4. Grotesque 4:00
5. Red Dawn 3:47
6. 400 2:00
7.Boo-gy Land 5:30
8. Oasis 4:40
9. P.I.T. 2:57
10. Shelter 4:00
11. Forest 3:48
12. Moss 3:43
13. Madness 3:22
14. Graves under moon 2:26
15. Trainspotting 7:29
16. Polyot 4:17
17. I hate this pretty world 2:33
18. Last hope 3:12
19. Journey is over 5:29

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Something manufactured after 1994
  • Graphics: Any
  • Sound Card: Good enough to listen music
